instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-end creative tool. Precision is key. Do not use generic 'Bootstrap' layouts. Use the Bento Grid system. Ensure all interactive elements have hover states.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout_strategy: Use a 3-column layout for the main workspace: Sidebar (Nav), Main Stage (Canvas), Right Panel (Properties).
instructions_to_main_agent.stage_visualization: Create a distinct visual state for each of the 3 stages. Stage 1: Split View. Stage 2: Exploded Layer View. Stage 3: Composite View.
instructions_to_main_agent.api_keys: The Settings modal must be accessible from the Sidebar. Use a 'Password' input type for keys with a toggle visibility icon.
instructions_to_main_agent.file_upload: Support Drag & Drop. Show a progress bar during the 'Processing' state.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all buttons, inputs, and major containers (e.g., 'upload-zone', 'layer-preview-1').

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
